field.name: summary
field.value: There should be a way to preserve url query string arguments while using DiggStylePagination

field.name: description
field.value:
When using DiggStylePagination viewcomponent with it's default parameter, the computed links will crop actual url parameter.
It should exists a parameter to enable query string argument preservation.
The attached patch solve the issue by adding a viewcomponent parameter PreserveQueryString of boolean type to AbstractPaginationViewComponent.
If set to true and both Url and UsePathInfo properties have their default value (null and false respectively), it will preserve existing query string parameter.
The CreateUrlForPage method was also marked as virtual to allow inheritors to override url crafting for each page.
